channel.title: KVM install on Ubuntu 19.10
channel.description:
FYI: Just finished installation of Whonix in KVM on Ubuntu 19.10 (rolling). Only small hickup was problem identical to the issue with Arch linux,resolved by following Arch bug issue mentioned in KVM install guide.
A big Thank You to everyone involved in creating this wonderful software!
